channel.title: I need help... sorry new at coding :P
channel.description: when i run the source [run.cmd] i get this after the handlers finish loading. Handlers Finished Loading Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 1Pure_Shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:80) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:144) [this is deltascape source] can somebody help me fix this D: rep++ for whoever helps first :P!

item.title: I need help... sorry new at coding :P
item.dc:creator: @Regsoul Regsoul
item.description:
@Regsoul wrote:

[quote=“123kdd100, post:5, topic:451889”][quote author=Regsoul link=topic=554775.msg4063167#msg4063167 date=1343611428]
thanks guys!
but after spacing out the shops.cfg with TAB i still get
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:82)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:33)
at server.main(server.java:144)
[/quote]

Try deleting the code then re-writing this with tabs this time?[/quote][quote=“123kdd100, post:5, topic:451889”][quote author=Regsoul link=topic=554775.msg4063167#msg4063167 date=1343611428]
thanks guys!
but after spacing out the shops.cfg with TAB i still get
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:82)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:33)
at server.main(server.java:144)
[/quote]

Try deleting the code then re-writing this with tabs this time?[/quote]

Ah. just did that and it worked. thanks

Read full topic

item.title: I need help... sorry new at coding :P
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Seems as if for some reason you’re using the space key in your shops cfg file, you need to use the tab key in those types of files.
